name: Foreign Intruder
description:
Foreign Intruder

My first semi-story based game with a new art style I was trying out, started in the major game jam 4 with the theme "cosmic", is a game where you play an astronaut on a solo mission to locate earths missing cows. Lets just say their mission doesn't go as planned and now you must retain as much oxygen as you can. Rush back and forth to patch holes that mysteriously keep popping in your roofless air dome, and protect your oxygen generator from on-coming falling... comets? See how long you'll survive on this foreign planet and beat your own hiscore. You'll probably never beat my hiscore of 18778 THAT'S for sure.

How to Play

-press F to interact with things on the ship/patch holes

-hold SHIFT to pick up your generator and release to drop it
